metadata.synopsis: Banter between SH and Lae'zel in Act 2 when the player has romanced Lae'zel

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I'm a tad surprised you change into more comfortable garb at camp, Lae'zel. You strike me as a 'sleeps in her armour' type.
1.context: NodeContext: Idle banter with Lae'zel. Applicable to either SH arc

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: It would cause too much noise during my nighttime... exertions. I do not wish to alert foes of our location.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Nighttime exertions...? Oh, I see. Well, considerate of you, I suppose.
0.context: NodeContext: realisation/slightly flustered (Lae'zel is in a romance with the player) Applicable to either SH arc
